features.title: Dark Illusion
features.summary:
Winner of the 'FISCHER AUDIENCE AWARD-MICHAEL CACOYANNIS AWARD' in the 55th Thessaloniki International Film Festival in 2014

Winner of the 'Best Script Award' in the 10th Cyprus International Film Festival in 2015

Winner of the 'Best Actor in a 2nd Leading Role Award' in the 6th 'Bridges' International Film Festival

Winner of the 'GREEK FILM LOVERS CLUB Award' in the 8th annual London Greek Film Festival

Official Selection in the 11th Chinese American Film Festival

Official Selection in the 1st Phoenix Film Festival Melbourne

Alkis is an introvert photographer with a personality disorder. Despite the strong relationship he has developed with his mother, heâ€™s driven to despair because of the tension between her and his alcoholic father. As a result, he decides to leave the family home and move into his own place. However, a journalism project he gets involved in will disrupt his delicate personal balance, and he will begin to question more and more aspects of the reality he is living. Trapped in a nexus of contradictions, he will try to find the way to redemption.

Director: Manos Karystinos
Script: Anastasia Koziba
Cinematography: Thanasis Konstantopoulos
Editing: Chris Filippou
Sound: Dimitris Keramydas, Aliki Dima, Eleni Kavouki
Music: Bjorn Alexandridis, Marios Podaras aka Deep In Mind
-Vocals: Roula Tsernou
-Musician support: Yannis Somaras
Costumes: Lia Tschenkeli
Make up: Dimitra Porfyri, Angela Karanasou, Irini Marangou
